help.title: File Recovery Tool - Help
help.param.name: Generic text parameter (drive letter, filename, pattern, etc.)
help.cmd.listdeleted: List all deleted files on a drive
help.cmd.searchdeleted: Search for deleted files by name pattern
help.cmd.restorebyrecord: Restore a deleted file by its MFT record number
help.cmd.detectoverwrite: Detect if deleted file data has been overwritten
help.cmd.diagnosemft: Diagnose MFT (Master File Table) health and structure
help.tip1: Use 'help <command>' for detailed help on a specific command
help.tip3: Filter levels balance performance vs completeness:
help.tip3b: - Use 'none' to see all file paths (slower)
help.tip3c: - Use 'exclude' for fastest scan (system files hidden)
help.tip5: Cached results speed up repeated searches (60 min validity)
listdeleted.desc: Scans the Master File Table (MFT) to list all deleted files on the specified drive. Results are cached for 60 minutes.
listdeleted.filter.none: Show all files with full paths (slowest)
listdeleted.filter.skip: Skip path rebuild for system files (balanced)
searchdeleted.desc: Search for deleted files by filename pattern and/or extension. Uses cached results from previous scans for fast searching.
searchdeleted.param.pattern: Required: Filename pattern (* = wildcard for all)
setlang.invalid: Invalid language code. Use 'setlang' without arguments to see available languages.
scan.cache_saved: Cache saved successfully. Use 'searchdeleted' for fast searching.
error.create_mapping_failed: Failed to create file mapping! Error: %lu
error.invalid_pe: This is not a valid PE file!
overwrite.mft_corrupted: The MFT record header is corrupted or invalid.
overwrite.may_overwritten: This record may have been overwritten or never contained valid data.
overwrite.file_type_resident: File Type: Resident File (data stored in MFT)
overwrite.status_fully_available_mft: Status: FULLY AVAILABLE - Data is in MFT record
overwrite.status_fully_available: Status: FULLY AVAILABLE - All data can be recovered
overwrite.status_partially_available: Status: PARTIALLY AVAILABLE - Some data can be recovered
overwrite.status_not_available: Status: NOT AVAILABLE - Data has been completely overwritten
overwrite.sampling_note: Note: Detailed cluster information not available in sampling mode
overwrite.reason.extreme_entropy: Extremely high entropy (>7.95), likely random/encrypted data
overwrite.reason.high_entropy_valid: Very high entropy but has valid structure (compressed/encrypted file)
overwrite.reason.high_entropy_compressed: High entropy with valid structure (compressed/encrypted file)
storage.detected_hdd: Storage Type Detected: HDD (mechanical hard drive)
storage.too_few_records: Too few MFT records for accurate storage detection
storage.drive_failed: Failed to get physical drive number (Error: %lu), defaulting to SSD
storage.no_extents: No disk extents found, defaulting to SSD
storage.open_failed: Failed to open physical drive (Error: %lu), defaulting to SSD
storage.query_failed: Failed to query storage properties (Error: %lu), defaulting to SSD
detect.starting: Starting optimized overwrite detection with multi-threading support
detect.completed: Detection completed in %.2f ms: Total=%llu, Available=%llu, Overwritten=%llu (%.2f%%), MultiThreading=%s
detect.batch_read_failed: Failed to read clusters at LCN %llu
detect.sampling_mode: Sampling mode: checking %llu out of %llu clusters (interval: %llu)
detect.mt_starting: Starting multi-threaded detection with %d threads for %zu clusters
detect.optimal_threads: Optimal thread count: %d (CPU cores: %d, Storage: %s, Clusters: %llu)
detect.cluster_small: Cluster count too small for multi-threading
detect.ssd_mt_enabled: SSD detected with sufficient clusters: multi-threading enabled
detect.nvme_mt_enabled: NVMe detected with sufficient clusters: multi-threading enabled
detect.mft_sig_warning: MFT record signature invalid, but attempting to continue
detect.mft_used_size_zero: MFT record UsedSize is 0, record appears to be wiped
detect.mft_used_size_warning: ; UsedSize exceeds record size, using actual size
detect.mft_offset_small: FirstAttributeOffset (%u) too small, record severely corrupted
detect.mft_offset_bounds: FirstAttributeOffset out of bounds, record severely corrupted
detect.mft_partial_corrupted: MFT record header partially corrupted, but attempting data recovery
detect.mft_attempting_recovery: Attempting to recover data despite header corruption...
detect.no_data_runs: No data runs found - file is resident (data stored in MFT)
crp.title: === Paginated Interactive Recovery ===
crp.opt.autoclean: autoclean=<N>     - Auto-clean folder when file count >= N (default: 50)
crp.cmd.recover: r          - Recover all files on current page
crp.no_results: No carving results available. Run 'carve' or 'carvepool' first.
crp.no_match: No files match the specified criteria.
crp.try_lower: Try lowering minconf or using 'all' option.
crp.skip_recovery: Skipping recovery. Use 'c' to clear manually.
crp.unknown_cmd: Unknown command. Use: r, f, n, p, g, c, q
